function.name: device_move
function.description: This function is used to move a SmartThings device to a specified location.

location.description: The location where the device is currently located.

room.description: The room where the device is currently located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to move.

rvcLocation.description: The location to which the device should be moved.

rvcObject.description: The object to which the device should be moved.
